long_description: Have more fun on the water this summer in the adjustable comfort of the women's MTI Mona Lisa all-purpose PFD. Multiple points of adjustment ensure you have a comfortable fit while recreational kayaking, canoeing, stand-up paddleboarding and playing in the water. Adjustable shoulder straps offer a versatile fit; either tighten up the shoulder area for a snug fit or loosen it for more chest room. Shoulder adjustments are covered to add protection and provide a smooth, finished look to the vest. Dual strap adjustments create a snug fit on each side; the adjustable waist makes it easy to get in and out of the PFD thanks to its quick-release buckle. 2 front cargo pockets with mesh drainage securely store essentials such as your sunscreen, keys or a waterproof camera. Reflective tape enhances visibility in dim light. The MTI Mona Lisa features a durable nylon shell.
short_description: Have more fun on the water this summer in the adjustable comfort of the women's MTI Mona Lisa all-purpose PFD.
